A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I wish I could just reclaim my time for this movie.  It was horrible.  Star Wars is not a melodrama RIAN JOHNSON!  You have ruined this in every way shape and form.  No wonder you were fired.  A couple of things why in the world was the last scene shot?  We don't wanna see a fake Luke we wanna see a real Jedi fighting.  I cannot even start to understand this script or director.  Why in the blazing hell were no question from the first movie answered NONE?  No Jedi training at all...  Luke was a bumbling idiot.  And Leia using the force @#$@##@$@#$#@. Retire dude!
